name: Sielc
startIntroPart1: Across a vast ocean dotted with over fifteen thousand islands, our nation stands as a beacon of resilience and renewal. Under the iron-fisted rule of Juliono—deemed a tyrant by foreign eyes yet celebrated at home as an independent hero—we cast off the shackles of imperialism and colonial oppression. Our legacy is one of survival, self-determination, and an unyielding commitment.
startIntroPart2: Juliono, you has driven both imperialsm and colonialsim and liberated Indonesia. Will your governance once more bring prosperity to Indonesia after you drove the invader? Will you build a civilization to stand the test of time?
defeated: Today we fall, but our hatred will not perish with us. Though defeated, the embers of our fury remain—and they will ignite a revenge as inevitable as the tide.
declaringWar: Enough talk! We declare war on you and feel our wrath!
attacked: You dare to strike at our territory! We will meet you at battlefield!
introduction: Welcome, esteemed emissary. Here, in our sprawling archipelago, strength and culture intertwine. Our leader, Alicar, rules with unwavering resolve. While his methods may seem harsh to outsiders, they are the bedrock upon which our freedom was forged. Let us engage not in the transient pursuits of military might, but in the enduring art of cultural exchange
neutralHello: Greetings, emissary what bring you here?
hateHello: Why are you here? just spit it out!
tradeRequest: Sielc has offered you this wonderful offer
